Body:
prob = np.atleast_3d(prob)
prob = np.array(prob) / np.amax(prob)
base_pts = []
N = 0
while N < num_points:
    pt = np.random.rand(3)
    [indx, indy, indz] = np.floor(pt * np.shape(prob)).astype(int)
    if np.random.rand(1) <= prob[indx][indy][indz]:
        base_pts.append(pt)
        N += 1
base_pts = np.array(base_pts)
return base_pts
